meanings.sent1: Her nonattendance at the party was noticed by everyone.
meanings.sent2: The teacher marked his nonattendance in the attendance sheet.
meanings.sent3: His nonattendance at the concert left his friends disappointed.
meanings.sent4: The nonattendance of the main speaker caused a stir at the conference.
meanings.sent5: The nonattendance of the star player affected the team's performance.

meanings.definition: Absence from a scheduled event or meeting.
meanings.sent1: The nonattendance of the CEO at the meeting raised concerns among the employees.
meanings.sent2: She regretted her nonattendance at the important conference.
meanings.sent3: The nonattendance of the groom at the wedding was a big surprise.
meanings.sent4: The nonattendance of the key witness delayed the trial.
meanings.sent5: His nonattendance at the award ceremony was due to a sudden illness.
